mapper.select: SELECT * from ( SELECT a.id as processReportId, a.code, d.process_id as processId, h.name as processName, a.supplier_id as supplierId, j.name as supplierName, e.inspection_scheme as checkPlanId, p.name as checkPlanName, e.materiel_id as materielId, f.name as materielName, f.specification, f.serial_no as serialNo, a.completion_count as checkCount, 0.0 as conformityCount, 0.0 as reworkCount, 0.0 as scrapCount from mes_process_report a LEFT JOIN mes_dispatch_item b ON a.dispatch_item_id =b.id LEFT JOIN mes_working_procedure_detail d on b.foriegn_id=d.id LEFT JOIN mes_working_procedure_plan e on d.plan_id=e.id LEFT JOIN mes_check_plan p on e.inspection_scheme=p.id LEFT JOIN cus_materiel f on e.materiel_id=f.id LEFT JOIN cus_supplier j on a.supplier_id =j.id LEFT JOIN mes_process h on d.process_id=h.id ) aaa where processReportId=#{reportId}

SELECT b.code, b.id as projectId, b.name as project, b.norm, b.method , a.whether_check as whetherCheck from mes_process_check a LEFT JOIN mes_check_project b on a.pro_id =b.id LEFT JOIN mes_working_procedure_detail c on a.foreign_id=c.id LEFT JOIN mes_dispatch_item f on c.id=f.foriegn_id LEFT JOIN mes_process_report g on f.id=g.dispatch_item_id where a.type=#{type} and g.id=#{reportId}

select a.code as checkCode, a.id as reportCheckId, b.id as processReportId, b.code as reportCode, a.supplier_id as supplierId, j.name as supplierName, a.check_plan_id as checkPlanId, p.name as checkPlanName, a.materia_id as materiaId, f.name as materiaName, a.check_count as checkCount, a.conformity_count as conformityCount, a.rework_count as reworkCount, a.scrap_count as scrapCount from mes_process_report_check a LEFT JOIN mes_process_report b on a.process_report_id=b.id LEFT JOIN cus_supplier j on a.supplier_id =j.id LEFT JOIN mes_check_plan p on a.check_plan_id=p.id LEFT JOIN cus_materiel f on a.materia_id=f.id WHERE a.id=#{value}

SELECT * from ( select a.id as id, a.code as checkCode, IFNULL(a.create_time,'') as createTime, c.operator, d.name as operatorName, m.name as deptName, e.process_id as processId, f.name as processName, a.materia_id as materiaId, g.name as materialName, g.serial_no as serialNo, g.specification, a.check_count as checkCount, a.conformity_count as conformityCount, a.rework_count as reworkCount, a.scrap_count as scrapCount, c.device_id as deviceId, h.name as deviceName, a.supplier_id as supplierId, a.create_by as createBy, pp.name as createName, j.name as supplierName, n.work_order_no as workingProcedurePlanCode, o.plan_no as planNo from mes_process_report_check a LEFT JOIN mes_process_report b on a.process_report_id=b.id LEFT JOIN mes_dispatch_item c on b.dispatch_item_id=c.id LEFT JOIN sys_user d on c.operator=d.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept m on d.dept_id=m.dept_id LEFT JOIN mes_working_procedure_detail e on c.foriegn_id=e.id LEFT JOIN mes_process f on e.process_id=f.id LEFT JOIN cus_materiel g on a.materia_id=g.id LEFT JOIN cus_device h on c.device_id =h.id LEFT JOIN cus_supplier j on a.supplier_id =j.id LEFT JOIN mes_working_procedure_plan n on e.plan_id=n.id LEFT JOIN mes_production_plan o on n.production_plan_id=o.id LEFT JOIN sys_user pp on a.create_by=pp.user_id )aaaa
